name: places/ChIJ60MHxbxZwokRIGQqHgXb9DQ
adrFormatAddress: 230 7th Ave, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text:
Hands down the most comfortable, best fitting shirt I've ever owned. Was able to exchange for the perfect fit on my first purchase. They were really accommodating with me. Now that I know my fit, I've purchased a half dozen shirts and they all make me look trimmer than I am. Had to write this because I'm not normally excited about clothes and these Teddy Stratford shirts are great. Thank youüôè!
ü§òü§òüî•üî•

originalText.text:
Love these shirts, own a few. Had some minor questions, the support was outstanding. (Which should be a given, but not always the case, hence worth mentioning these guys do it superb)
Re the shirts: I got the casual ones, finally some good fitting stuff! Had to custom fit shirts before, now I have a go to solution.

originalText.text: Big fan of Teddy Stratford shirts. The site is so easy to navigate and then the buying experience was awesome - I love how the shirts arrive and it makes you feel like you're part of something. But more importantly, the shirts themselves are overall excellent. My button down wardrobe is slowly becoming all TS shirts - and I find myself wearing them in all sorts of occasions. The quality and fit for me is perfect. And I love showing the shirt off when I'm out with friends - the zipper discussion is always fun - cause it's great!

originalText.text: Horrible experience.   Order small batch shirt and paid $25 for two-day shipping.   After 7 days I received zero communication from the company.  I reached out by email (no phone number for contact option) in which they responded the shirt was out of stock and as it would not return to stock as it was discounted.  If not for my inquiry I would have continued to pay for a shirt that I would never receive.   Their solution was to allow me to pick a different shirt instead.   No compensation for to waive the two day shipping fee on a different shirt.  No discount off future order.   Either cancel order or replace with different shirt.

originalText.text: Ordered a shirt, came in 2 days. Fit as expected (excellently) but not quite as good as a shirt that I can no longer find any where, so I emailed them and took them up on the $50 wager they have on their website. Within 4 hours of my email they emailed me back, no questions, and paypal-ed me 50 bucks right away. This is amazing customer service. Excellent product, and great customer service!
